thread.title: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus promotional poster leaked, reveals specs and pricing
thread.title_full: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus promotional poster leaked, reveals specs and pricing

title: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus promotional poster leaked, reveals specs and pricing
text:
Huawei P10 and P10 Plus promotional poster leaked, reveals specs and pricing Huawei P10 and P10 Plus promotional poster leaked, reveals specs and pricing By - February 6, 2017 “The P10 and P10 Plus are expected to come with up to 6GB of RAM, up to 128GB of storage and Iris scanners” 
Huawei is expected to launch its next flagship smartphones, allegedly dubbed the P10 and P10 Plus, at its pre-MWC event on February 26th. Ahead of the unveiling, we have already seen a couple of renders of these phones. Now a promotional poster for the P10 and P10 Plus has hit the interwebs, which has revealed their key specs and pricing details. 
As per the poster, the Huawei P10 will arrive in three variants – 4GB RAM + 32GB storage, 4GB RAM + 64GB storage and 6GB RAM + 128GB storage. They will be priced at RMB 3,488 (~Rs 34,170), RMB 4,088 (~Rs 40,000) and RMB 4,688 (~Rs 45,930) respectively. 
The Huawei P10 Plus will be the larger variant of the two. The phone will be available in two configurations – 4GB RAM + 64GB storage and 6GB RAM + 128GB storage. They will be priced at RMB 4,988 (~Rs 48,870) and RMB 5,688 (~Rs 55,730) respectively. 
The Huawei P10 will reportedly feature a 5.2-inch full HD display. The P10 is expected to come with a 5.5-inch dual-curved quad-HD display. The phones will be powered by HiSilicon Kirin 960 processors, and will come with Leica-branded 12MP rear cameras, 8MP selfie shooters, Iris scanners, Harman Kardon audio technology, fingerprint sensors and Android Nougat. We will have official details about these phones later this month, so stay tuned.
